name: In House Hostel
description: In House, we do not only offers beds. We offer great times and great experiences. We also offer air conditioning :) Located in the heart of Izmir, In House Hostel provides help to our guests who would like to visit the surrounding areas (Pamukkale, Ephesus, Cesme, Selcuk). These areas are very near, so you can simply spend the day there and come back enjoying the great nightlife of Izmir and the comfort of In House Hostel. Our building is brand new, warm and perfectly constructed to suit the needs of hostel travelers. We have our common room in the entrance where you can hang out, combined with a kitchen where you can cook/prepare your meals. Up on the top we also have our terrace where you can sit down, relax and hang out. Facilities include: Air conditioning, Free internet (WiFi), Free luggage storage, Free tea and coffee, Free lockers, Laundry facilities to wash your clothes if you've been on the road for a while, travel information to help you plan the next stage of your journey without getting scammed by dodgy tour guides, free pub crawls, free walking tour (not like the typical tourist walking tour scams, we will tell you the local and real stuff.) We are right in the heart of Izmir, 3 minutes walk from Alsancak (main train station IZBAN). From 'In House Hostel', you can easily go to the main sights in Izmir, such as the Kordon (coast), Kıbrıs Şehitleri (Main Square) and the Clock Tower in Izmir. The hostel is 2.7 km from Izmir Clock Tower, 600 metres from Ataturk Museum and 1.5 km from Cumhuriyet Square. Izmir Adnan Menderes Airport is 17 km away. We have two 8 bed dorms, one 6 bed dorm and one 4 bed dorm. If you want some more privacy, we have a double(en suite) and a single bed private room. In-House Hostel Izmir's Policies & Conditions: Cancellation policy: 24 hours before arrival. Payment upon arrival by cash or credit card. Check in from 14:00 . Check out before 12:00 . Taxes included. Breakfast not included. You can leave your luggage in the hostel till you leave for the airport/station. Do not worry if you come earlier than the check in time, if your bed is ready, you can check in earlier, and if not, you can sit in our lounge drinking a cup of tea.

address_obj.address_string: 1460 Sokak Number: 75, Alsancak, Konak, Izmir 35220 Turkiye
